TopicTitle: The almighty wing flap of doom/efficiency.

Articles.Content:
If you have ever had a random glitch with the aerodynamics in KSP than post it here! I will even help by starting!

I don't have any hard proof but I was flying a space plane before crashing it and having this control surface fling itself into a giant ark from KSC to the south pole.

Yeah sometimes when you warp when on the piece of debris it'll either end up on an interstellar orbit or just explode and break the game. However you can abuse the infini-glide glitch to make some fantastic creations. Such as strange flying snakes with no engines that do over 1000m/s at sea level.

Not aerodynamics, but this thing is powered by the enslaved Kra- *ahem* glitches.

I love sharing it, but I think I do so too much..

Not aerodynamics, but this thing is powered by the enslaved Kra- *ahem* glitches.

I love sharing it, but I think I do so too much..

Ah yes the the FTL Egg, man the amount of times this thing flinged me around in who knows what directions was amazing. Good job making it by the way!
